en.description: The Sancti Castanas are an exclusive version of the Castanas available only from New Loka. It has higher base damage, status and critical chance as well as innate Purity effect.

ru.description: Эти дистанционно подрываемые электрические ловушки используются последователями Новой Локи для защиты своих храмов и святынь.

ko.description: The Sancti Castanas are an exclusive version of the Castanas available only from New Loka. It has higher base damage, status and critical chance as well as innate Purity effect.
